thread.title: Salma Hayek wore a multicolored dress with flower jewel buttons, and that’s not even the most interesting part
thread.title_full: Salma Hayek wore a multicolored dress with flower jewel buttons, and that’s not even the most interesting part

author: Ashley Rey
title: Salma Hayek wore a multicolored dress with flower jewel buttons, and that’s not even the most interesting part
text:
Salma Hayek wore a multicolored dress with flower jewel buttons, and that’s not even the most interesting part Mexican-American actress and producer Salma Hayek has the secrets to marriage, parenting , and aging gracefully. The stunning former model gave us a taste of her classic sense of style at a recent Harper’s Bazaar event, and we couldn’t keep our eyes off her! Not only did her rock a mean 1970s glam look with her makeup and dress, she showed us all what being 50 and fabulous truly looks like. 
Yep, you read that right. The Frida actress turned the big 5-0 towards the end of 2016, but doesn’t look a day over 30. From her flawless skin to her fit shape, Salma Hayek served epic #lifetimegoals on the red carpet. 
Salma Hayek’s dress is to die for. Frazer Harrison/Getty Images The woman sure does know how to accessorize. Her gold clutch is everything! Steve Granitz/Getty Images Oh, and we can’t forget about the shoes. These fuschia heels are almost too perfect. Steve Granitz/Getty Images We’re saying “yes” to everything that Salma is serving up right now. Rachel Murray/Getty Images for Harper's Bazaar From head to toe, the screen queen looks absolutely stunning. David Crotty/Patrick McMullan via Getty Images Did we mention how Salma never disappoints on the red carpet? She’s always giving us the hottest looks to fawn over, and we’re so grateful! Salma is definitely at the top of her game.

Cheers to more awesome fashion inspiration in 2017!
